title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This course introduces you to the fundamentals of C programming, covering topics such as variables, loops, and functions. Suitable for beginners.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Dive into the world of algorithms and data structures with this comprehensive course. Learn sorting, searching, and algorithm analysis.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Get a head start on competitive programming and data structures with this C++ course. Ideal for budding programmers.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Master essential data structures like stacks, queues, and linked lists in this hands-on course.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Explore the world of object-oriented programming in Python, covering classes, inheritance, and encapsulation.

title: Software Engineering
details: Learn the principles and practices of software engineering, including agile development and project management.

title: AWS & Cloud Computing
details: Gain expertise in Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing, covering EC2, S3, and Lambda among other topics.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn the ins and outs of MySQL database management, from creating tables to writing SQL queries.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Sharpen your problem-solving skills with this course, featuring coding challenges and algorithmic puzzles.
